name: Paw bakery and cookies
description:
Little brave dog opened bakery for kids! Make sweet cookies and treat your parents and friends! It is so cool!
Find objects in kitchen and start to making cookies!
Mix flour, sugar, cacao, milk and eggs. Turn in mixer and relax! Put forms and make heard cookies, gingerbread, candy and other! Put into bake and wait 5 minutes!
Wow cookies are ready!
Decorate sweets by chocolate, marshmallow, marmalade, stickers- it is very fun! Invite your friends to playing the most addicting kitchen game! Help dog to create beautiful and tasty cookie!
